name: Trusty Debate Simulator
description:
The candidates for the future presidential elections have nothing to do with those of the previous ones… NOTHING OK?!

This time they come with shocking arguments, well-made, serious, engaging.

They are ready to deepen and confront their ideas so that everything is explained to you in the most itligible way possible.

The world is not lost, they are here, our saviors are real!

And you in the story?

Your mission: Manage the show so as not to lose too much audience!

Otherwise…

You’ll be fired!

HOW TO PLAY

Not for now! We want to continue to work on the project. Soon you’ll be able to kick candidates and generate new ones to manage the audience! We also want to add many other features that we are keeping secret for now… 

Be patient, it’s coming, in the meantime, you can still sit down, listen, and get their captivating ideas!

CREDITS

@LukuluK = Developper & Game Designer

@MatoLabu = Voice Actor, Composer & Game Designer

@retmia = 3D Artist, Blendshape Artist & Game Designer

👽 In its current state “TRSUTY DEBATE SIMULATOR” is not really a game but rather a procedural weird political talk show! There is currently no interaction, so sit back on your couch, crack open a beer and enjoy! 👽
